content.detailedDescription:
I guess the only reason i could see it, was because it "reflected" light, as the reflection quickly ran over its 'body' i could clearly make out some of the outer linings, i don't drink, wasn't high, and consider myself a smart person.   it happened like this; i went in my back garden to take a piss and as i looked up to the stars -like i always do- i was stunned, about 50 to 60 meters high, i could clearly make out this 'ship', it looked like an upside-down boat but much more square, didn't look aero-dynamic at all, moved real slow, and as that bronze-like reflection went over it, then i was sure that either i lost my mind or i saw for the first time ever something out of this world. i checked if it couldn't have been a weather-balloon, but it was way to big.. to this day my mind still does not believe what my eyes saw.

i thought it looked like a ship and to be honest the first thing that came to my mind was that it "renewed it's "shield"" almost stealth-like.I know it sounds real dumb, but that was my first thaught

4. it floated over, no noise i think, it was heading away from me, look the sky was dark and i only saw it when it reflected light, but i had the impression that the light ran over a big part of this vessel.

5.I was in awe, just stood there, i didn't even want to blink, i went back inside shaking, nervous, regret that i couldn't back it up. i calmed down for about 45minutes, maybe less, then i told my girlfriend, but she's too rational to be open for other life.. to this day i blaim a space-partical hitting my eye and causing this-as they do every second- this way i have an explanation
content.summary: Not typical.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my friends sitting in a park and i happened to look up and see this what i thought was a star, it was kinda hovering about but it looked really out of place so i watched it for about 2 minutes while it just hovered almost, it just looked like a fireball floating in the sky, no bigger then a star in the sky but orange, and what i could tell it was pulsating. it "floated" for a while and then it just shot off in one direction at a seriously fast speed, if i blinked i would've most definitely missed it, but i felt like i couldnt move so i kept watching it. certainly one of the most weirdest things i've ever seen and that has happened to me.
content.summary: Bright orb in sky hovering then zipping away.

content.detailedDescription: i was at work on break watching a little bit of the air show from the roof at work that luke afb was puting on.I was watching the thunderbirds flying.As they were doing a menouver flying straight up at altitude of around 15 to 20 thousand feet,i noticed a small bright white light fly right past one of the planes as they were breaking formation.It passed just below one of the planes moving from south to north.Wasnt going very fast and only appeared for about a minute untill i lost sight of it when it flew past the sun,i didnt see it anymore after that.I know for a fact that there were no other planes in the area as trafic is diverted away from the base because of air show.The thunderbirds were the only ones flying at the time.Ive never saw a ufo in person before besides t.V. and finally i saw one.
content.summary: Was a small white sphere, about a 1/4 size of an f16.

content.detailedDescription: At 8:15 pm (pacific time) in danville, california i was in the backyard and happened to be glancing up towards the sky. there was a lot of ambient light coming from city lights so only the brightest stars were visible. i was looking at the star polaris towards the north east and instead of seeing the one star (polaris) i saw two. then one of them started to move slowly towards the north east. the object initially looked like a star, then momentarily increased in brightness (white light) to the point where it was the brightest object in the sky at that moment (the moon wasn't visible yet). then after just a few seconds the light dimmed and then changed colors from white to red. it continued to dim a bit more but remained red until it slowly faded off to the north east. the entire event lasted a little less than 5 minutes and was clearly witnessed by both myself and my girlfriend. at the same time as the event, there were airplanes in the sky as well, and there was a distinct difference between the object and the airplanes. my initial thoughts were that it could be a satellite, however they are almost impossible to see in my area because the sky never gets dark enough. then i thought it could be either the space shuttle or the iss, but according to spaceflight1.Nasa.Gov neither the shuttle nor the iss would have been visible in northern california on that date.
content.summary: Star-light object at high altitude moving and changed in color/brightness.

content.detailedDescription:
About 2:25am 3-21-2009 i was sleeping in my bed and
somebody was talking to me and i felt something
like a persons elbow aginst my middle of the outside
upper left leg as i was ln a fetal position lying
on my right side and it was dark in my room. except
for the dim light about 50 feet from my window in
the apartments. i awaken to see a invisable thin
person move a way from me and disaper into the
darkness, and i kept saying jahovah over and over i
was scaired and i lyed there awake for a few minites
and i got up and turned on the light till about
6:00am i sleep some in that time frame then i went
back to sleep again after i turn off the light.
i have a camera at arms lenth 2 1/2 feet away but the
encounter did not last long enuff for me to think of
grabing it. it normaly does not as i awaken they leave
and they know they can get away. i wish they would
let me take at least one or more good picture of them
i dont think i will ever get use to this even after
all these years, i think its a lack of info from them.
content.summary: Encounter

content.detailedDescription: I had been too  see my mother in hospital and was walking back too my car when looking up too the sky i saw a dim light coming in from the south west at first i thought it may have been a satellite, but as it got closer  i could see it was something else, as it moved a string of lights moved the length of it then went out to which it the stopped, then a light came on the end off it so there was a light both ends there was no noise coming from the craft then in a 45 degree angle it shot off i would say that the object was at least 150 long.
content.summary: Ufo spotted in poole dorset.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and my friend were driving down south mopac from 1826 when my friend pointed out the object as he was driving. i saw a circle of purple lights hovering, bobbing, and doing a sort of spin to our left, flying away from us. i did not want to stop and investigate, being in a moderately secluded area; roughly two minutes later, we turned around to investigate further, me picking up my courage, and there was no trace of it anywhere in the sky.
its physical features were a circular, possibly disc-like, with a ring of purple lights around it; as it bobbed, i saw its underside, with four very bright blue lights underneath it.
we did not get any pictures, as i was initially too shocked to want to stop, and i assumed we only had our cell phones.
i have included a very rough drawing of it; please excuse it if it isn't any help; i am not artistically gifted in any definition of the term.
content.summary: Circle of purple lights with blue lights underneath.

content.detailedDescription:
In december 2008 myself, wife and two children were sitting in our up-stairs living room watching t.V.  christmas lights on, and snow on the ground.  my wife, son, and myself noticed a light illuminating the room and windows. we have six large windows and sliding glass door, my wife looked outside to see if a car was turning around or pulling into our street. but no car or people or even flashlights were present. then about 15-20 seconds it was gone. i asked her if she noticed something strange about the light, she agreed but couldn't explain. i noticed that the light was lighting up the window sill on the bottom of the window so the light came from straight up. my daughter was on the computer and did not see anything.
  we have had medflight helos fly over, and civilian airplanes too, but all with sounds, we can hear them quite well, being our house is older and not very sound-proof.  
  the next morning i went down-stairs where my mother lives(she is diabled with m.S. and lives with us).  i sked her first if she noticed anything last night and left it at that.  she then told me that she noticed a strange light around 8:30pm. she also thought it was possibly a car but did not see one. then i proceeded to tell our story of the light and how it came from above the house. 
  the light did not move like landing lights or spotlight would on a moving aircraft.   
  my son said that he witnessed the same kind of event in the summer, just after dark. he said it was as if we had a spotlight right above our trees in the back yard pointing down.(our trees are approx 80-100ft high) he said at the time he couln't understand, because our lights dont shine that high and it came from up high and lit up the backyard and lasted about 20 seconds also without any sound even with the windows open. 
  we live in a quiet neighborhood and no neighbors saw anything. 
  my wife noticed the same thing around march 14th 2009 but not sure.
content.summary: House illuminated by downward light , no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Heading to my banking machine just over st-patric's bridge  a small glowing orb caught my attention.I pointed it out to my son who as i thought it was below cloud level and moving at a constant rate of speed.As we kept walking towards the vanier parkway heading in an easterly direction we kept watching this object as it suddenly sped up turned right, towards the south, then slowed, and then took off at a great speed and slowly faded from sight in the distance. this is not the first time i see what i would normally associate with a satellite just to watch it do things satellites are not supposed to do.Most of the time they seem to be coming from over the gatineau,quebec mountains to the north of ottawa just a couple miles away.I did not take photo's for phone cams are terrible (well mine is anyway) so i don't bother anymore.
content.summary: Fast moving orb.

content.detailedDescription: While staying at st. george island fl. each night about 9pm while watching the stars we started to see orange lights appear. sometimes the lights would split into two, one traveling east and climbing to a higher altitude then disapearing while the other staied fixed on the horizon and disapearing at the same time the other one did. sometimes the lites would apear and then fade out. on several occasion we would hear jets flying out over head. knowing of the air force bases close by we didn't know if there were military excersizes out over the gulf or were they chasing the lights. the lights looked like orange flares but traveled horazontaly and climbed never falling to earth as flares do.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lights would appear then separate into two to three lights then fade out.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving to work at about 6:30 am, i noticed an odd strobing object in the sky over the west side of cleveland, ohio.  i was heading westbound on hwy 480 and the object was traveling roughly east to west.  what caught my eye was the bright strobes.  i couldn't tell what shape the object was, as the strobes were too bright and the object was several miles away ahead of me.  it appeared to be several thousand feet above ground.

the odd thing about the object, besides the extremely bright strobes, was that i could see no red or green marker lights that are on all military and civilian aircraft, nor the small strobes that are always present on conventional aircraft.  the strobes on this craft appeared to be the size of the anti-collision lights or the landing lights, and were strobing in primarily white lights with occasional blue ones.  i can not over-emphasise the brightness of the strobes, they were quite a bit brighter than landing lights and that was what caught my eye.  having been in the air wing in the marine corps, i am familiar with the configuration of aircraft lights, and this did not fit the conventional orientation.

the other odd thing was that this object flew over or very near to hopkins airport, not a common thing for a conventional aircraft to do as it could possibly interfere with air traffic control.

perhaps there is a mundane explanation for this, but i am at a loss to explain it.  the object continued westerly and i lost sight of it as i made my way toward downtown cleveland.
content.summary: Very bright strobes, not landing lights or marker lights.

content.detailedDescription: We are truckdrivers. we were delivering to fairburn, ga. and just below the airport. it couldn't have been a plane because this object was perfectly spherical but huge. it was fell before i could get my camera out. traffic was heavy surely others saw it. it fell slower than a shooting star and was blue and yellow with a long trailing blue white tail. the event lasted about 45 sec. and we heard no noise. there was no explosion.
content.summary: Lg. descending yellow fireball with long blue/white tail.

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:30 pm i was looking at the stars as it was a clear nite and i noticed this very bright ,white lite in the north east. there was a lot of air traffic  and all of their lights were considerably of less intensity.I have seen many aircraft approaching  me head on with there landing lights on and this light was far brighter.It made  a very easy turn to the east un- like a commericial aircraft that would take a very gradual turn, it was not 90 degress but close,as it did so i thought that its landing light would start pointing away from me and gradually lose its intensity, but it did not change and continued south east  starting to be hidden by my roof line. so it took about 8 seconds to walk over to another window  but it was gone when i looked. the air traffic in the area seemed to be all at a level below this  light and moving faster.It was the cleanest white light i have ever seen, it was beautiful.I forgot to say when i saw the light in the north east it was going south.
content.summary: The slowest moving white lite with the gentlest left turn i have seen. . completely vanished after about 25 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard getting a quote from direct tv having a somke. then while i was looking east at an 80 degree angle or so above me i saw what looked to be a flare. but it was too far up and traveled too far to be that. what i saw of it, it burned a bright deep green for 2-3 seconds. it traveled in a straight line. i think nne to ssw. then looked like it burned out. after it was over i looked around for a few seconds then ran up stairs to tell my girlfriend.
content.summary: Green fire ball.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to walk the dog...Coming back towards the house i looked up and saw two very bright ring shaped objects. the reason it caught my attention so closely is that it is a very overcast night - not a star to be seen in the sky. i was immediately amazed as i have never seen anything like this before. i started yelling for my boyfriend to come out. he came out and saw what i was seeing and told me to go in for the camera/video camera. i ran in and got both....Trying to take footage and capture pics at the same time. got maybe 2 minutes of video footage and nothing showed up on there - which i could tell right away because i could see nothing through the view finder. i took 2 pictures from the digital camera. we watched the objects literally dancing throught the sky. at one point one of the objects dropped down below the tree line from view and then bounded back up towards the other object. the objects were very bright in color...At some points bright white, blue and turning red. unbelievable! the pictures do not do what we saw any justice at all. we blew them up as much as we could and still it did not accurately show what we saw..But i am glad we have something to show for it.
content.summary: Circular - bright lights - moving all over the sky - looked like rings dancing in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside with our new digital camera after a thunder storm.  taking pictures of cloud formations when i noticed a commercial jet flying overhead.  i don,t remember seeing the ufo at the time i took the picture, i was just wanting to test the camera's ability to capture an immage i knew was at least 10,000-20,000 feet away.  none of the other pictures that were taken that day had any defect or oddities.  i would appreciate your oppinion on the immage.  at normal zoom the ufo looks like a classic cigar shape, but when i zoom in it appears to be 3 uniform points of light in a straght line.  the other odd thing is that it seems to be at or near the same altitude as the jet and appears to be stationary at the time of the photograph. i have included 2 of the other pictures i took that day which do not show anything unusual.  thank you for your time.
content.summary: Took a picture of a jet flying over head and found ufo near it.

content.detailedDescription: Went out for a smoke and was watching the sky. saw a star-like object to the west that was flashing red, green and blue every 2 seconds. t first when i saw it it remained rather still, until it darted from left to right in less than a second. if you hold your hand up to the sky the sitnace would be about a spread finger's worth. i called my sister outside and see verified it wasn't a plane. we live in the oia landing corridor about 3 miles out. i tried to get photos from my phone but it is a pos nokia low-end.  this object while i was watching it turned a slow circle like it was banking, and then  proceeded to the west and dsiappeared.
content.summary: Flashing primary colors.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving westbound on peoria ave between 55th & 59th avenues and saw a strange fireball heading upward from the earth at an approximate angle of 65 degrees sw of my location.  noticed it because it was a non-blind yet quite bright light source that is usually not on the horizon - and because it was moving.

i was in complete awe and pointed it out to lorry, who was driving the car, saying, "what the f*** is that?"  her first theory was "fireworks", until the fireball gracefully changed course from what appeared to be a 45 degree upward direction parallel to the earth to about 85 degrees upward/parallel for approximately 10 seconds, then back to its original course of approximately 45 degrees upward/parallel .

at this time we stopped at the light at the intersection of 59th & peoria avenues and heard the men two cars over from us also discussing the fireball, laced with similar explicits.  i was still in awe, my mouth hanging open and goosebumps all over my body.  as lorry fumbled with her cellular telephone to try to get a video, the object fizzled out - got only suddenly, but very gracefully, approximately 30 seconds into its revised course - and turned into a blinking light-bluish "pixel" in the sky.  the blinking "pixel" was visible for about another 10 seconds before it disappeared into the great dark abyss of the night sky without changing course or speed.

this was truly one of the most amazing things i have ever witnessed.  i've seen the strange blinking lights and lines of light that most consider ufos in the skies of southwestern arizona, where i grew up, as well as the fire-like missile launches from vandenburg afb, but i've never seen a fireball with such accurate grace turn into a blinking "pixel" and then just disappear.
content.summary: Upward fireball in glendale az

content.detailedDescription: Ufo recorded with my camera sony trv 310, the object show a strange light, ray, gas or laser. change direction many times.
content.summary: Ufo with some kind of laser or gas light.

content.detailedDescription:
Good morning! i would like to see if you could clarify something for  
me. last night my husband and i were out driving south on a1a in ponte  
vedra beach, fl through the guana preserve, around 10:50pm and we saw  
what seemed to be a reddish orange ball with a tail traveling through  
the sky parallel to the trees, appearing to be traveling north. then  
the tail was gone and it seemed to kind of hover then move in an arc  
and was gone. at first we were thinking wtf was that, then after  
stopping at the beach to star gaze, grabbed our iphone's and saw that  
there was the launch of the kepler delta ii rocket last night right  
around the same time window. so after we got home we found some videos  
of the launch and it did look similar, except that we could not see  
the rockets disengaging like you can on the video. i saw on your  
website there's two reports of ufo sightings around the same time  
last night describing a fireball object that then lost it's tail,  
hovered and was gone. this was the kepler right? in the spirit of  
truth that being said you may want to remove those posts as a ufo  
sighting to be fair. not that i don't believe in ufo's, i saw one as a  
teenager a long time ago, but never have since. i admit i was hopeful  
i may have saw one again, but it just seems obvious to me that it was  
kepler. thanks and have a good day!
content.summary: kepler or ufo?

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i go and set in different locations to look for strange lights and ghostly happenings - we were sitting at a pull off on a lonely stretch of road in the dark and we saw the outline of my truck on the trees about 50 ft. from us - we looked to try and find where the light was coming from and we looked throught the windshield and saw a huge triangle shaped object barely moving , just above the tree tops , no sound at all - the object got over the cut over in front of us and shot a bright light down front the front and lit the rear up like it was looking for something. after several seconds it cut the light off or retracted it and just kept moving slowly out of sight. i told a law offical a few days later and he said i wasn't crazy as that they had a report of the same thing i saw but it a long ways from where we saw it. i have had a sighting of this object 2 or 3 times- one time i blinked a light at this light i saw and it did a 180 turn and came ove us and it was the same triangle with a light on each corner. we still go and look for lights and objects when we get a chance - also have heard humming like an electronic signature so i know it is something not of this world . alot of strange things are going on in the area and i allways have a witness with me . strange lights zig zaging and going out . i try to investigate as much as possible as i believe in aliens and u f o"s
content.summary: Saw a huge triangle shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter was going from omaha to l.A. and somewhere between saint george utah and misquette nev.  she was awed by the mountains and stuck her hand out the window and snapped 2 photos.  she said she didn't see the object while driving, but when she looked back at the pictures the object was there.  she was using a digital camera.  odd!

thanks  mike    see attached photos.    ���
content.summary: While driving west.

content.detailedDescription:
I am an attorney and have been practicing law in san diego since 1981.  i own an ocean-front condominium located aproximately four miles south of rosarito beach, baja, mexico, at calafia, km 34.5 (approximately 20 miles south of san diego).  (see calafiacondos.Com for detailed information concerning the location.)

on february 4, 2009, my girlfriend, roberta, and i drove from downtown san diego to my condo at calafia.  we left san diego at approximately 3:00 p.M.  as we were driving south from san diego, beginning almost immediately after leaving downtown, both of us repeatedly commented on the strange clouds in the sky that had been produced by chemtrail activity that had taken place the previous 24-36 hours.  the strange cloud formations continued to be present for the entire trip to calafia.


we got to my condo at approximately 4:00 p.M. and didn't think any more about the strange cloud formations until the next day.  

at approximately 3:00 p.M., roberta and i went for a walk on the beach and around the grounds and swimming pool.  this was roberta's first trip down to the beach and swimming pool area.  we took her kodak z812 is point and shoot digital camera (several photos of what we saw are included in the attached zip file: "hand of god.")

after spending some time on the beach, we climbed up the stairs from the beach and began walking south along the cliffs (which are approximately 20-25 feet above the water level) to the swimming pool.  

as we were walking, roberta said: "hey look, there's a prisim without a rainbow."  i looked up and saw the patch of sky depicted in the center of photo 100_3748 ("48")in the attached zip file.  in order to better orient the location of the patch of sky where the light was being refracted, i widened the shot to place the sun at the center of photo 100_3749 ("49").

earlier in the day (evidently approximately 6 and a half hours earlier), i changed the batery in the camera. athough i set the correct date of february 5, 2009, i didn't set the correct time.  the information summary from the "properties" on these photos indicates that photos 48 and 49 were both taken at 6:37.

after i took photos 48 and 49, roberta and i turned our attention elseware.  however, approximately three minutes later i looked back to the prisim in the sky and saw what is depicted in photos 54, 55, 57 and 58, all of which the info summary indictes were taken at 6:40.

by 6:43, all that was left is what is depicted in photo 61.

i have the complete series of photos (20 or so from the beach and 20 or so after the "hand of god", all of which were taken at 3264 x 2448 (approximately 8 mega-pixels).  i've played around with various filters and such.  although i'm not an expert, i think there's alot more info in these pictures than meets the eye.

also, on march 2, 2009, after a couple days of heavey chemtrail activity, i took 172 photos of some real strange stuff, including some pretty clear photos of a "flying saucer."  (see, the photos attached in the zip file "flyng saucer."  especially photos 100_4218 through 100_4221.)  again, i've got the originals, all of which are 3264 x 2448.  i think that most of these photos also contain alot more info than meets the eye.

i would love to meet with you to show the originals and discuss this incident.

feel free to give me a call.  i'm usually at my home, where i can be reached at 970-372-0955.  or, try my office in san diego at 619-53-0111.

thanks for your time in reviewing this material.

rick bove
rickbove@gmail.Com
rbove@pacbell.Net
content.summary: During chemtrail activity, an area of the sky suddenly began refracting light like a prisim; then exploded into bright-white light in the shape of a hand.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside when i noticed 2 extremely bright, pure white, rapidly flashing lights on an object at below normal cruising height. llanelli is a coastal town and the object was moving from the coast inland at very high speed. the lights were pure white and created a cone shaped "loom" when they were on. they flashed at about 2 flashes per second and were synchronous.

there was no sound and the whole episode lasted slightly less than 2 minutes. there were no coloured navigation lights. the lights shone downwards from the body of whatever it was.

i believe i also saw the same object in 2008 on the evening of the 9th august at just after midnight though this time the lights only flashed twice in rapid succession. again i could not see the object itself just the bright lights creating a cone shaped loom.(it was my birthday so i know the date and time)

just for reference llanelli is quite close to raf st athan (well close if you're in a rapidly moving aircraft anyway). it was at raf st athan where last year there was a report of a police helicopter chasing an ufo over the bristol channel.

i live underneath the flight path for 2 airports so i know what ordinary planes look like. this was definitely not a normally illuminated commercial aircraft though it might well have been military as i don't know what lights they use. i was staying with family members so you appreciate that this wasn't something flying near my home and although there were other aeroplanes in the sky at higher altitude they were slower moving and all had red/green navigation lights and even their white lights were of a very different hue.

just for completeness this was not a satellite, nor a natural body, not the planet venus, and hence my filing.
content.summary: An object flying at slightly lower altitude than commercial aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
I can't really believe that i am doing this. because at the beginning, i didn't believe this ufo stuff. my father however liked it very much, for some reason. but after what i've seen, i'm a believer. i even thought i was crazy - actually, i still believe that i am indeed crazy... but that event truly disturbed me. 

i'll try my best to explain.

it was my family vacations. we always go to the country-side when we are on vacations or holidays. on a camping resort corumb���, i don't know if it's like that in english, in portuguese is salto corumb��� - camping clube hotel. i even have the link of their website.
these are the geografic coordinates of this club.
15���50'49,5"s
48���45'52,1"w

http://www.Saltocorumba.Com.Br/index.Php?Id=acesso

well, it was a day before christmas, round about midnight. i was sitting outside on the cold and dark night, my parents were inside the house. i was just staring at the stars, i'm a star lover, i confess. so i was just looking up, looking at that beautiful milkyway and all those stars. then something in the horizon caught my eye. a little light, as big as the other stars, at first i thought it was a satellite or something like that. because the little light was doing a straight movement. but, all of a sudden the little light started to return on the line it was doing. it was doing a up-forward-straight movement, then it started to go right back at the same movement it was doing. i thought it strange, and i started to follow the light with my eyes. when the light reached the ground, it made a motion on the horizon. as i was looking: an up, down, right and left movement. 

it really started to scare me. because it was going faster and faster and faster... i started to reach out for my camera that was just at the floor. when i looked up to see if the light didn't go away, it stoped, brighten up a little bit more, and like a shooting star, when up to the skies. after the light went away a strong and freezing wind blown where i was. it was really scary. 

my father and my mother don't know about this. i didn't want to make them think i was going mad. even though i thought i was...
  
when the light went away, i was so afraid, so scared, that i got up, and went inside the house, without a word to my parents and i made myself go to sleep. 

but i couldn't sleep that night at all... i was scared, that "something" would get me. i was feeling sick. like, having a sensation that something was watching me... so everytime that i started to sleep, a nightmare filled my mind. and it was always the same nightmare. about the light. that the light came upon me. 

one of my friends, said that it was probably a demon, or something like that. i don't know! i really don't know!!

i hope you guys can believe me... you must hear these thing everyday, everytime and everywhere. but, you are the only ones that can make me believe that i was not at all crazy. 

to speak the truth, if i had the power. i would go back on that night and make sure i was inside the house with my parents. not staring the skies. so i wouldn't have seen that light.
content.summary: A star-like object making peculiar movements in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I have to check the year with friends who observed this.  all of us have advanced degrees (masters/ph.D.S).  i know it was a full mooon in august that evening.
content.summary: Hovered star-like on horizon near wawawaii/snake river - many witnesses saw it hovering low on horizon all evening; then it disappeared faster than imaginable into the night sky with a bright flash of light.

content.detailedDescription: approximately 9 pm, thursday.  very clear evening.  my wife & i sitting in a hot tub.  my son had just left and commented that he saw the big dipper.  we were discussing how he changed subjects in the middle of a sentence.  i looked up and saw what i thought was a gaggle of geese coming towards us.  i called my wife's attention and pointed. she thought they were geese also.  the ufo was flying very fast and straight heading in a northeast direction.  it just flew straight. no up, down or side to side.  much faster than jets that we have viewed before.  it basically flew above our heads and vanished.  it all happened very quickly.  the best i can recall is that it was a v formation of about 7-10 pale orange or yellow triangular shaped lights.  if they were seperate "aircrafts" they were flying in perfect formation.  absolutely no noise or sonic boom.  we discussed the possiblity of a stealth fighter or flying wing, but this thing was faster than any aircraft i have witnessed.  it didn't appear to be that high up in the sky, but that is difficult for me to judge.   absolutely no alcohol or drugs involved.  i did not feel threatened or anything.  it just kind of freaked us out and i feel i have to contact someone who wouldn't be as skeptical about a ufo sighting like i think the local police or sherriff would be.  thanks.
content.summary: V shaped , dimly lit, very fast, no noise.

content.detailedDescription: So just after sunset as i was looking around i noticed two bright objects that appeared out of nowhere. they seemed to be in perfect formation with one about 65 degrees above the horizontal above the other. no sounds or noise was made, and there was a large group of people there who saw it. they made a very,very slow turn and then all of the sudden disappeared as fast as they appeared. they seemed to occupy a very small area relative to their speed. the general area was eastern towards wyoming.
content.summary: Two bright lights flying in perfect formation.

content.detailedDescription: I arrived home from work at 10:08p to get my cell phone. i had recently reported a sighting to your organization a couple of weeks ago from january so i've been looking to the skies alot more lately. anyway, i pulled into the driveway and saw the object in a ne position about 2 miles or less away, i am not quite sure the exact altitude. i noticed it was blinking and the colors were changing, so i ran inside and got my phone to take a pic. you can't see it on the phone, but i got my binoculars out to have a better look. the object was clearly changing colors and rapidly changing shape. i was so scared but i had somewhere to go and i brought mt binoculars with me. as i drove south on us-25 toward lisle rd. (where my first sighting took place) i notice that i was coming closer to it. as i turned down lisle rd. you can see a pretty big open field to the left and just above the field hovering over the trailer park was the ufo! about 1,000-1,500 ft. up about this time. i pulled over and got my binoculars out again and it exibited the same properties as before, just hovering stationary not moving. i had to rush to meet my cousin for the money she owed me. she lives just across the street in the adjacent trailer park. when i got to her house the treeline shielded the ufo from my sight and i couldn't see it. i ran in and ran out as quickly as i could try and track this ufo's flight pattern. i would've chased it all night! when i got back to the intersection of us-25 and lisle rd. i looked to my right at the field where i had seen it before and it was gone! i am not crazy, i do obsess about this, i don't drink or use drugs and i am not on any psych meds. this thing was there and just as quickly, gone. something is going on in this area and i want to know what. these things are disguising themselves as stars so that we don't pay anyattention to them. you cannot drive closer to a star and around it when you make left turns just less than 2 miles away from the initial point of sight. stars don't change shape and color before your eyes stuff like that takes tens of thousands or millions of years to do.
content.summary: Orange orb, changes colors from red to green to white to orange. stationary, hovering, blinking.

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday 3/8/2008 around 7pm. cool dry air and dusk with plenty of light.I was walking to my truck and saw a black triangle in the air. at first i thought it was this really cool looking kite or maybe a ballon. it slowly flew over my neighbors house then over my street. it was traveling slowly and was about the size of a small car. it was solid black but the bottom of this craft was iridescence golden black. it moved slowly about 15 - 20 mph and in a straight line with no sound. its altitude was approx. 100 ft and it never varied. its wings were drifting from left to right. i ran inside and grabbed my son. he saw it as it flew over the back yard. i got into my truck and tried to follow it but i did not see it when i pulled onto the main street . there have been multiple sitings in stevensville, corpus christi and san antonio since january 08. i found some pictures online of extactly what i saw. the drawing is mine but the pictures are from 

http://www.Ufocasebook.Com/2009/sc031609.Html
content.summary: A black slow moving craft flew above my house.
